channel.title: rain on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in rain on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.7: Mount Madonna, Davenport Beach, San Francisco, Yosemite
LOG 3.7 Of rain and coming home
item.description: 19th June 2013 The sound, smell and sight of a storm are reassuring and comforting to me. I sit here thousands of miles away listening to Ghanana ghanana from Lagaan for a moment transported to Bangalore.

item.title: LOG 1.5: Snow, it turns to rain
item.description: 15th January, 2011 Hello everyone, It has been a while since I last wrote. I’ve been busy seeing houses, working (:O ! :)), and going out with friends.

item.title: Adult
item.description: 25th May 2007 I suddenly realize I am a machine. I do the same things everyday. I’ve stopped feeling. I’ve stopped thinking. I’m too busy with my life.

item.title: For Now
item.description: October 2008 This yellow evening, Winds tell of rains to come. A healthy, happy wind That I haven’t felt for so long. Dry mango leaves
